import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import TitleBar from'./TitleBar';import'../styles/LoginScreen.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LoginScreen=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const[isSubmitting,setIsSubmitting]=useState(false);const[showPassword,setShowPassword]=useState(false);const handlePasswordChange=e=>{setPassword(e.target.value);if(error)setError('');};const handleLogin=async e=>{if(e)e.preventDefault();console.log('Login işlemi başlatılıyor...');if(!password){setError('Lütfen şifre girin');return;}setIsSubmitting(true);setError('');try{console.log('Şifre doğrulama yapılıyor...');// Elektron API'sini kontrol et
